definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: This season, frequent rainfall, the temperature gradually lower end of the 10 snowbound mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 此季節降雨頻繁，氣溫漸低，10月末將大雪封山。

sentences.english: I was continually getting up and going to the bathroom to refill my glass.
sentences.chinese: 我頻繁起來去洗手間，把我的玻璃杯灌滿水。

sentences.english: Guys shouldn't give flowers too often or too infrequently.
sentences.chinese: 男士送花不應該太頻繁或太稀少。

sentences.english: Experimental results show that this algorithm improves the speed of frequent itemsets mining.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果顯示，該算法提高了頻繁項集的挖掘速度。

sentences.english: He frequently to Wang Jing wage restaurant meals, and when the waiter asked her designated.
sentences.chinese: 他頻繁來王靜打工的餐館喫飯，並指定要她當服務員。

sentences.english: For maximum efficiency, frequently accessed tables should have as few extents as possible.
sentences.chinese: 爲達到效率最大化，頻繁訪問的表區段應當越少越好。

sentences.english: Over-washing can dry your hair, making it brittle, so only wash when you have to.
sentences.chinese: 洗得太頻繁會使頭髮乾枯易斷，所以還是控制一下吧。

sentences.english: Ethnic groups in Hezhou interact each other frequently and complexly.
sentences.chinese: 賀州族羣間的互動是頻繁而又複雜多樣的。

sentences.english: Once the directory had stopped being regularly used, the directory would be unmounted.
sentences.chinese: 目錄停止了頻繁使用後，該目錄將會被卸載。

sentences.english: He smokes far more often than he used to.
sentences.chinese: 他煙抽得比以前頻繁得多。

sentences.english: Hurricane forecasters expect this year's hurricane season to be busier than average.
sentences.chinese: 氣象預報員預計今年的颶風季會比往常更加頻繁。

sentences.english: But water infusion may cause the charging structure displacing or escaping.
sentences.chinese: 固體顆粒封孔的裝藥結構頻繁發生炮孔堵塞。

sentences.english: More trade in livestock helps to pass along nasties too.
sentences.chinese: 牲畜買賣的頻繁也幫助了病毒的傳播。

sentences.english: Another painful affliction was boils, big and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 另一個折磨我的病痛是癤子，又大又頻繁。

sentences.english: "Nigga" is frequently heard in gangsta rap songs.
sentences.chinese: “黑鬼”是黑幫歌曲中頻繁使用的一個詞。

sentences.english: The game started at a quick pace with a lot of interchanging of passes.
sentences.chinese: 比賽一開始速度就非常快，傳接球配合頻繁。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
